channel.title: Help with Command!

item.title: Help with Command!
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Hello guys, this is a very easy fix, but I can’t seem to remember how I could possibly work it out. So in other words…I’m stumped.
Okay so what I’m trying to do is make it so ONLY Donators and Staff positions can yell. It works perfectly, the only problem is, when I am PlayerRights == 0 and I use a command, it will tell me what I made it say when a normal player tries to yell.
Here’s the code:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1 || donator >= 1) {
String titles = “”;

            if (donator == 1) {
	    titles = "@blu@[Premium Member] ";
	}

	if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@blu@[Moderator] ";
            }

            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@blu@[Administrator] ";
            }


            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
            }
	
	
	if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("####")) {
                titles = "@red@[OWNER] ";
            }

//if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("####")) {
//titles = “@red@[Owner]”;
//}

           yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
	}else{
	if(playerRights == 0) {
	sM("You must be a Premium, Donator, or a staff member to yell!");

}
}
[/code]

If you could help me out, leave a reply please.

Read full topic
